extracted_playbook.title: Update CMU Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update to CMU firmware version 13.6.1 and enable secure update feature on all CMUs of an RTU500.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Security Practices and Firewall Configurations
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended security practices and firewall configurations to protect the process control network from external attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Physically Protect Process Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure process control systems are physically protected from unauthorized access and have no direct Internet connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Portable Devices for Viruses
extracted_playbook.description: Carefully scan portable computers and removable storage media for viruses before connecting them to a control system.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

cve_id: Secure Update Bypass Vulnerability in Hitachi Energy's RTU500 series Product
